</gmd:citation>       <gmd:abstract>         <gco:CharacterString>This project concerns the presence of oysters at the site of Kentish Flats Offshore Wind Farm after its construction. A series of field sampling of the local native oysters was undertaken to be able to assess the levels of specific chemicals in the flesh of the oysters. A comparison is made between the pre and post construction results. </gco:CharacterString>       </gmd:abstract>       <gmd:pointOfContact>         <gmd:CI_ResponsibleParty>
